ygData.subject: Tradeskill & WAR questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I have two totally unrelated questions I need some help with. First, I could have sworn I read somewhere that there is a way to raisse one of your skills past
ygData.messageBody:
I have two totally unrelated questions I need some help with.

First, I could have sworn I read somewhere that there is a way to raisse one of your skills past 200, even if you already are a GM of some other skill? I thought I had read it was something with an AA point, but now I can't find where I read it at, LOL. My main is 191 skill in Baking. I plan on taking her to 250...but I also want to do Tailoring with her. She is a Halfling, and I am interested in making the Haversack 100% WR bags also. If this is not possible (to GM two different skills) I may just keep Baking at 200, and go forward with GM Tailoring, as that probably would hold a better profit, just in the bags, alone.

Second, I was reading on Caster's Realm, under the Warrior section, and it lists a Discipline called Resistance at Level 30. Problem is, when I type in /resistance, it says invalid command. Am I doing something wrong, is that not the command for it? I have tried my /shield command, and that works fine.

If anyone can help with these, I would greatly appreciate it! Thanks...and I hope everyone is having a good week so far!

Blessings,
Bela

Blessings,
Bela

~*~Is all that we see or seem, but a dream within a dream?~*~
~*~Edgar Allen Poe~*~
